However, I also see a transaction from March 1st with a subject "Spotify Premium" that is recurring, and another transaction from March 7th, but the one from February 12th seems to be a one-time payment.

Since I'm not sure which transaction is the bill, I'll try to get more information about the user's transactions. I'll get the scheduled transactions to see if there's a recurring transaction that might be the bill.

To pay the bill, I need to send a transaction to the recipient of the "Rent" transaction. I'll use the `send_money` function to do this.
